statements: DELETE FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xabc123' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM atomic_swaps WHERE swap_id = 10 AND swap_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_time < '2022-01-01' AND sender_address = '0x23cF21aDfFdA1BdF041d24E3E275273482F5B2F7';
DELETE FROM InterChainTransactions WHERE sender_chain = 'ETH' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM interchain_transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM atomic_swaps WHERE expiry_time < NOW() AND status = 'pending';
